header.description: Base class for models that can be written to disk.

content.name: buffer
content.description: The buffer for this model. If one is cached, it is returned. If there is no cached buffer available, then this model will be serialized on the fly.

content.name: isCached
content.description: Whether this model currently has a cached buffer. True when the buffer is cached, false when it's not.

content.name: saveBuffer
content.description: Whether or not the buffer should be cached on this model. If the buffer is currently false and this is set to true, the cache is cleared.

content.name: getBufferAsync
content.description: Generates the buffer for this model asynchronously, and returns a Promise that resolves with it. To get the buffer synchronously, just access the 'buffer' property.

content.name: onChange
content.description: Deletes this model's cache and notifies its owner to do the same. You should never have to call this yourself.
